cause.description:
"BE A DIVA -- DEMAND HE WEAR PROTECTION"
The Candie's Foundation
"BE STRONG -- DON'T BE A STATISTIC"
~ facts ~
4 in 10 girls will experience at least one pregnancy before reaching age 20.
Only 41% of teenage mothers graduate from high school and only 1.5% will earn a college degree by age 30.
Nearly 80% of unmarried teen mothers end up on welfare.
Nearly 80% of fathers of babies born to teen mothers do not marry their babies mothers.
If you have unprotected sex, you have an 85% chance of becoming pregnant within one year.
Almost one million teenage girls will become pregnant this year.
"BE FOCUSED -- DON'T GIVE UP ON YOUR EDUCATION"
~ tips for teens ~ visit http://www.teenpregnancy.org/default.asp
How to Avoid Pregnancy > everything from abstinence to different forms of contraception.
Facts & Stats > The latest data on teen sexual activity, pregnancy and childbearing (lots of answers here).
Test Your Knowledge > Think you know it all when it comes to teen pregnancy? Prove it.
Teens Tell All > What do teens think about sex, pregnancy, contraception, parents, the media, and religion?
Teen Resource Guide > A list of web sites where teens can find further information.
"BE SMART -- THINK TWICE"
For the TEDDY GEIGER & CIARA Candies Foundation Commercial visit http://myspacetv.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=vids.individual&videoid=4179784
"BE VOCAL -- SAY NO WAY"
For more information and/or to get your very own 'Be Sexy Tee' visit www.candiesfoundation.org
"BE SEXY -- IT DOESN'T MEAN YOU HAVE TO HAVE SEX"
1. "I'm Sexy Enough... To Keep You Waiting"
cause.mission: help reduce teen pregnancy by raising awareness of this serious problem and the consequences.
